https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/sV0nhp3NbDWOzK5kWDXFrFNkODo.jpg On the night of the 2016 Presidential election, Cass, an L.A. club promoter, takes a thrilling and emotional journey with Frida, a Midwestern visitor. She challenges him to revisit his broken dreams - while he pushes her to discover hers. A Boy. A Girl. A Dream
